TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpContextWrapper extends System.Web.HttpContextBase

summary.span: 封裝包含個別 HTTP 要求之 HTTP 特定資訊的 HTTP 內建物件。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that contains HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別，而且也會公開型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class and also exposes the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外的應用程式中的類別。The class lets you replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

summary.span: 可讓您指定要求的處理常式。

span.span: Enables you to specify a handler for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定`handler`至`null`的預設處理常式用來處理要求。If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request. 您可以設定`handler`非同步處理常式或同步處理常式。You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler. 此處理常式必須實作介面。The handler must implement the interface.

exception.span: 方法已在 事件發生之後呼叫。

span.span: The method was called after the event occurred.

param.name: sessionStateBehavior
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定所需之工作階段狀態行為的類型。

span.span: Sets the type of session state behavior that is required in order to support an HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法。The method overrides the base method. 若要實作基底的方法，方法呼叫方法類別，以及傳遞`sessionStateBehavior`設定。To implement the base method, the method calls the method of the class and passes the `sessionStateBehavior` setting.
